name: Temple of The Catsidian God
description:
Things are not going well in the village. The vicious God Juzou stole all the cats and turned them into decorations in his newly built House - the Moon Temple! As the unrest grows among the people, a young ninja decides to take things into his hands. He will infiltrate the temple and try to bring all the kittens down to the people.

Ninja knows how hard the mission is. There was not a single human being that managed to get back from the temple alive. The young warrior knows the risk. He trained constantly and is prepared to face his destiny.
